import React from 'react' import Platforms from '../Platforms/Platforms' import {useSelectr} from 'react-redux' import {LoadGenres, CleanRta, CleanFilterGames} from '../../redux/actions' export const Form = () => { useEffect(() => { dispatch(LoadGenres()) // dado que se desmonta con el f5 return () => { /// por si entro y salio rapido me aseguro tener limpio rta console.log('saliendo form') dispatch(CleanRta()) dispatch(CleanFilterGames()) } }, [dispatch]) return (
) }
